Question.Subject: Poll: Country/Area and Internet Connection Speed?
Question.Content: You can give as little or as much info as you like, For instance mine will be: Kent, UK Home: 1.5mbps Bonded ADSL (live in a crappy village, Soon to move out and hopefully get Virgin Media 50mbps) Work: 4/4mbps SDSL

Berkshire. Virgin 20 Mb/s
